title: Go vegetarian
creator_credit: Mal Hamilton, Russell Gibbs, Streamline Digital and Adventist Media Centre
brief_description: The program examines vegetarianism as a healthy and exciting way of eating. It reviews the history of vegetarianism and the reasons why people have selected this option as a lifestyle choice. “Go vegetarian” examines the benefits of a vegetarian diet in terms of health, the environment and the economy as well as exploring the myths.
